bio:treatment.discussion: According to T. F. Stuessy et al. (1973), among others, Picradeniopsis is closely allied to Bahia. Indeed, the species are often treated as members of Bahia. Where they occur together, the two species of Picradeniopsis may produce more or less sterile hybrids.

references.reference: Stuessy, T. F., R. S. Irving, and W. L. Ellison. 1973. Hybridization and evolution in Picradeniopsis (Compositae). Brittonia 25: 40â€“56.
